thread.section_title: Wondershare 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Wondershare 的点评意见 | wondershare.net
thread.title: marta

author: marta
title: marta
text: I had a start loop problem with my iPhone 5s and after trying different solutions from internet i finally decided to spend the money and buy Dr. Fone -iOS System Recovery. 70 euros and all it did is tell me to contact costumer support. the support offered a pdf software as consolation... this product is completely useless and absolutely not worth the money. you will have to buy a new phone anyway BEWARE!!!!
